Dispute_Type: Procedural dispute over timeliness of submission
Legal_Issue: Whether the Board acted unreasonably in declaring the claim abandoned
Legal_Provision: Refugee Protection Division Rules regarding filing deadlines
Application_Error: Late filing of Personal Information Form due to misunderstanding
Evidence_Ignored: Applicant's partial completion of PIF and lack of intent to abandon
Legal_Standard: Principles of natural justice and procedural fairness
Governing_Rule_or_Provision: IRPA and Refugee Protection Division Rules on abandonment
Outcome_of_Review: Re-determination ordered by a different panel
Cause_of_Refusal: Late submission of PIF without accepted justification
Legal_Provision_Cited: Sections of IRPA and Refugee Protection Division Rules relating to claim abandonment
Evidentiary_Issues: Lack of evidence of intent to abandon
Procedural_Fairness: Failure to consider applicant's efforts to comply
Legal_Defense_or_Challenge: Challenge based on reasonableness and procedural fairness
Omission_Type: Failure to file PIF on time
